constituent: quake, rain, weather, sign of the dragon, cliff, two, hairpin, safety-pin
koohiiStory1: An earthquake is a sign that a dragon is awakening after a heavy rain... It is angry for having been woken up and it makes the earth thunder and quake above it.
koohiiStory2: Instant mythology: When heavy rains disturb a dragon hiding under the earth, an earthquake may result.
readingExamples: 震う (ふる.う), 震える (ふる.える)
words:
震わせる(ふるわせる): to be shaking, to be trembling
震える(ふるえる): shiver, shake, quake
地震(じしん): earthquake
